description:
With Vidaldus Taka defeated, only Ikaruga of Trinity Raven remains! Erza stands strong in her resolve, but the flashes of the sword Ikaruga draws are amazingly able to shatter even Erza`s powerful armor! Etherion begins counting down, and there is barely any time left before it fires. Will Erza defeat this powerful foe and make it to Jellal in time?!
Source: crunchyroll
